name: Friend
text: Hey, what do you think is for dinner?

options.label: more chicken
options.value: I see you, optimist that you are.

options.label: rice
options.value: It's all about the side dishes then.

options.label: pizza
options.value: Classic, you can never go wrong with a slice of pizza.

options.label: peas and carrots
options.value: Green and orange, my two favorite colors.

options.label: mixed vegetables
options.value: Are these better than a salad?

options.label: slab of tofu (I love being vegetarian)
options.value: Ahh yes me too. What's not to love.

name: Friend
text: menu.value But seriously, [menu] does make sense.
